name: Guard 1
Dialogue:
Only truly skilled trainers are allowed through. You don't have
the BOULDERBADGE yet! The rules are rules. I can't let you pass.
Oh! That is the BOULDERBADGE! Go right ahead!

name: Rival_Fight
Dialogue:
What? Player! What a surprise to see you here! So you're going to
POKEMON LEAGUE? You collected all the BADGEs too? That's cool!
Then I'll whip you Player as a warm up for POKEMON LEAGUE! Come on!

name: Rival_Fight after
Dialogue:
That loosened me up! I'm ready for POKEMON LEAGUE! Player, you need
more practice! But hey, you know that! I'm out of here. Smell ya!
